temperatureC.notes: Daily temperature averaged for selected month across baseline years.

rainfallMm.notes: Daily precipitation totals summed by month, then averaged across baseline years.

humidityPct.notes: Relative humidity monthly mean from daily values.

windKph.notes: 10m wind speed monthly mean from daily values.

uvIndex.notes: Monthly average of daily UV maxima across baseline years.

pm25.notes: Hourly PM2.5 values averaged for selected month across baseline years.

aqi.notes: Hourly US AQI values averaged for selected month across baseline years.

waveHeightM.notes: Hourly significant wave height averaged for selected month across baseline years.

wavePeriodS.notes: Hourly wave period averaged for selected month across baseline years.

waveDirectionDeg.notes: Hourly wave direction averaged for selected month across baseline years.

floodRisk.notes: Field intentionally kept as null with explicit missing status.

stormRisk.notes: Field intentionally kept as null with explicit missing status.
